title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 461.16 - Charges shall be just and reasonable
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 461.16 - Charges shall be just and reasonable

State Regulations

All charges to the accounts prescribed in this system for
steam plant income, operating revenues and operating expenses shall be just and
reasonable and any payments by the utility in excess of just and reasonable
charges shall be included in account 538, Miscellaneous Income

Deductions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
461.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
